summary.title: Module 9 | Improving your Skills
summary.description: Metasploit Windows 2008 box - Groovy Script Hack

threats.title: Generic spoofing threat
threats.description:
•	Implement strong auth
•	All secrets such as passwords are encrypted 
•	Prevent Jenkins from passing creds in plaintext over the wire

threats.title: Generic repudiation threat
threats.description:
•	Must implement Strong Authentication
•	Must use the logging features to keep an audit trail of any activity on the server
•	Must usage of Digital Signatures - when a document or message needs to be non-reputable and especially when such document/message may have come from an intermediate entity (e.g. aggregated across multiple users by a 3rd party) or through non-secure channels (no login, email or pen drive) etc.

threats.title: Generic tampering threat
threats.description:
•	Must implement strong auth
•	Must secure port 8383
•	Ensure Jenkins does not pass creds in plaintext over the wire

threats.title: Generic informtion disclosure threat
threats.description:
•	Implement role-based security model
•	Apply latest service packs after validation
•	Hardened the TCP/IP stack by applying the appropriate registry settings to increase the size of the TCP connection queue, decrease the connection establishment period, and employed dynamic backlog mechanisms to ensure that the connection queue is never exhausted
•	Implemented IDS (Intrusion Detection System) to detect and respond to SYN attacks

threats.title: Generic DoS threat
threats.description: Resource and bandwidth throttling technique implemented - we will develop a custom listener that monitors messaging from IPs. When it exceeds certain thresholds, we terminate connections from the IP. This includes validation and input filtering.

threats.title: Generic tampering threat
threats.description:
•	Encrypt messages
•	Implemented data hashing and signing
•	Implemented digital sigs
•	Implemented strong auth
•	Implemented tamper-resistant protocols across communication links. Secured communication links with protocols that provide message integrity

threats.title: Generic informtion disclosure threat
threats.description:
•	Implement role-based security model
•	Apply latest service packs after validation
•	Hardened the TCP/IP stack by applying the appropriate registry settings to increase the size of the TCP connection queue, decrease the connection establishment period, and employed dynamic backlog mechanisms to ensure that the connection queue is never exhausted
•	Implemented IDS (Intrusion Detection System) to detect and respond to SYN attacks
